identifier.sql_value: COALESCE(:tbl,:pkg,'')||:objtype||:code|| CASE WHEN :private THEN :userid ELSE '' END

data.content:
$agency_name
$agenzia_description
$agenzia_address
tel. $agenzia_tel
fax $agenzia_fax
$agenzia_email
$agenzia_web
 
MATE'S RECEIPT
 
 
Name of ship: $imbarcazione_nome Voyage no.: $voy_n Freight: $freight
Flag of ship: $imbarcazione_bandiera Port of Loading: $port Port of discharging: $next_port Date : $departure_date
 
Shipper B/L NO. Marks and nrs.
Container nrs.
Seal nrs.
NBR
OF
PACKS
 DESCRIPTION OF GOODS um WEIGHT um Measmnt Remarks
$caricatori_fullname_sr $bl_n $bl_marks_n $bl_pack_n $bl_descr_goods $measure_description $qt_bl $measure_msmt $bl_measmnt $bl_remarks
TOTAL $tot_qt_bl   $tot_measmnt  
 
                                                                                                                                                                                   Received on board
                                                                                                                                                                                     Officer in charge

compiled._bl_cargodocs: $@shipper_id.fullname_sr $bl_n $marks_n $pack_n $descr_goods $@measure_id.description $qt_bl $@measure_m.description $measmnt $remarks
compiled.main:
$@arrival_id.@agency_id.agency_name
$@arrival_id.@agency_id.description
$@arrival_id.@agency_id.address
tel. $@arrival_id.@agency_id.tel
fax $@arrival_id.@agency_id.fax
$@arrival_id.@agency_id.email
$@arrival_id.@agency_id.web
 
MATE'S RECEIPT
 
 
Name of ship: $@arrival_id.@vessel_details_id.@imbarcazione_id.nome Voyage no.: $@arrival_id.voy_n Freight: $freight
Flag of ship: $@arrival_id.@vessel_details_id.@imbarcazione_id.bandiera Port of Loading: $@arrival_id.@agency_id.@port.citta_nazione Port of discharging: $@arrival_id.nextport Date : $departure
 
$@bl_cargodocs
Shipper B/L NO. Marks and nrs.
Container nrs.
Seal nrs.
NBR
OF
PACKS
 DESCRIPTION OF GOODS um WEIGHT um Measmnt Remarks
TOTAL $tot_qt_bl   $tot_measmnt  
 
                                                                                                                                                                                   Received on board
                                                                                                                                                                                     Officer in charge
